name: libInline
description: libInline provides an easy interface for interacting with inlinerolls from a message, including retrieving dice sets and/or obtaining the roll-tip for chat-level output.For more information, see the original thread in the API forum:https://app.roll20.net/forum/post/9770117/script-libinline-provides-an-easy-interface-for-inlinerolls-including-roll-tips
